project_abstract.cdata: The Second Energy Conservation Project will expand domestic investment in energy efficiency projects, through the aggressive development of China's nascent Energy Management Company (EMC) industry, thus achieving large-scale energy efficiency improvements, and associated reductions in the growth of carbon dioxide emissions, and other pollutants. The project includes three components: 1) the EMC service component consists of a large capacity building, and technical assistance program to assist EMC develop businesses, and help develop policy support. The function of the EMC Service Group is to provide service to emerging EMCs, in developing a training programs for their establishment, corporate structuring and identification of types of corporate partners, and in overcoming operational problems. In addition, EMC will advocate, and recommend policy support activities to the Government, international institutions, and other groups to foster industry growth; 2) the project management and monitoring component, will support central coordination, monitoring and reporting of project activities; and, 3) the EMC loan guarantee program is designed to provide emerging EMCs with enhanced opportunities to receive loans from domestic banks, and to engage the banks in the development of a sustainable EMC industry.

P067337.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>节能项目二期</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目通过逐步发展中国新兴的节能服务产业，扩大国内节能项目投资，开展大规模节能改造，减缓二氧化碳排放增速，减少其它污染物。本项目设有三个子项目：（1）节能服务公司服务子项目包括一项大规模能力建设和技术援助项目，旨在帮助节能服务公司开发业务，帮助其获得政策支持。节能服务公司服务集团的职能是向新兴节能服务公司提供服务，制定有助于其成立的培训计划，确立公司结构，识别公司合作伙伴，克服经营问题。此外，为促进产业增长，节能服务公司还将向政府、国际机构和其它团体倡导并建议实施政策支持活动；（2）项目管理和监测子项目将支持中央项目办协调、监测并报告项目活动；（3）节能服务公司贷款担保子项目旨在向新兴节能服务公司提供更好机会，以便其从国内银行获得贷款，同银行合作共同实现节能服务产业可持续发展。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
